text: Nikolay Karasyov (; born 1927) is a retired Soviet rower. He competed in the coxless four at the 1956 Olympics, but failed to reach the final. He was the Soviet champion in this event in 1953, 1954 and 1956. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Olympic rowers of the Soviet Union Category:Rowers at the 1956 Summer Olympics Category:Soviet male rowers
title: Nikolay Karasyov (rower)
